# mtaux

<!-- badges: start -->

![GitHub release (latest by date including pre-releases)](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/netique/mtaux.svg?include_prereleases)

Auxiliary package for master thesis purposes.

This package is heavily inspired on and uses parts of code from [`reschola`](https://github.com/scholaempirica/reschola) package by Petr Bouchal et al.
